Models¶

class app.models.Cart(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: Model

Represents an item in the user’s shopping cart.

user

The customer who uses this website.

product_name

The name of the product.

quantity

The quantity of the product added by the user in the cart.

added_on

The date and time when the product was added to the cart.

Type:

datetime
